about.summary: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

name: cairo
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.12.18" %}

package:
  name: cairo
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: cairo-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  url: http://cairographics.org/releases/cairo-{{ version }}.tar.xz
  md5: 8e4ff32b82c3b39387eb6f5c59ef848e

build:
  number: 8
  skip: true             # [win]
  features:
    - vc9                # [win and py27]
    - vc10               # [win and py34]
    - vc14               # [win and py35]

requirements:
  build:
    - python                  # [win]
    - pkg-config              # [unix]
    - libtool                 # [unix]
    - xz 5.2.*                # [unix]
    - freetype 2.6.*           # [unix]
    - fontconfig 2.11.*       # [unix]
    - pixman                  # [unix]
    - libpng >=1.6.21,<1.7
    - zlib 1.2.*
    - icu 56.*
  run:
    - freetype 2.6.*           # [unix]
    - fontconfig 2.11.*       # [unix]
    - libpng >=1.6.21,<1.7
    - pixman                  # [unix]
    - zlib 1.2.*
    - icu 56.*

test:
  commands:
    # Check commands.
    - cairo-trace --help

    # Verify libraries.
    {% set cairo_libs = [
            "libcairo",
            "libcairo-script-interpreter",
    ] %}
    {% for each_cairo_lib in cairo_libs %}
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/{{ each_cairo_lib }}.a                                                 # [unix]
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/{{ each_cairo_lib }}.dylib                                             # [osx]
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/{{ each_cairo_lib }}.so                                                # [linux]
    {% endfor %}

about:
  home: http://cairographics.org/
  license: LGPL 2.1 or MPL 1.1
  summary: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ccordoba12
    - jakirkham
